BadgeDetail.Name: System optimisation
BadgeDetail.Description: This badge demonstrates you are able to run benchmarking software on a computer, assess the results and make suggestions on how to optimise its performance.

Task.Title: System scan
Task.Body: On your home computer do the following:Run a scan on your anti-virus program and write about what it found and capture a screen-shot. If you do not have one you can install a free one - AVG free anti-virus is good.Run your firewall and take a screen-shot, write notes on its current status and what that mean. If you don't have one,install one such as "comodo" free version Perform a drive defragmentation, take screenshots and write notes on how defragmented the drive was before and after.Look through your list of installed programs - are there any that you could remove? Take a screen-shot, write notes on any applications that could be removed.Compile all your screenshots and notes into a document and upload.
Task.HtmlBody:
On your home computer do the following:

  1. Run a scan on your anti-virus program and write about what it found and capture a screen-shot. If you do not have one you can install a free one - AVG free anti-virus is good.
  2. Run your firewall and take a screen-shot, write notes on its current status and what that mean. If you don't have one,install one such as "comodo" free version
  3. Perform a drive defragmentation, take screenshots and write notes on how defragmented the drive was before and after.

Look through your list of installed programs - are there any that you could remove? Take a screen-shot, write notes on any applications that could be removed.

Compile all your screenshots and notes into a document and upload.
